title: [K-12] Intensive Short-Term Engineering Education Program Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary engineering concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Low-cost technology utilization to enhance accessibility of engineering education for general citizens

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core engineering concepts with over 80% accuracy using pre-learning materials provided in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can apply three communication skills required for solving real engineering problems through collaborative activities.
Learners can submit engineering design process deliverables for each phase with 90% completeness using digital tools in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
